title: Best Quotes of the Week: CIMB Classic
headline: Best Quotes of the Week: CIMB Classic
description: Gary Player offers to help Tiger Woods get back on track, Michael Jordan disses golfer-in-chief Barack Obama and Fred Couples tells Ryder Cup alarmists to chill out in this week's edition of Quotes of the Week.
short_headline: Best Quotes of the Week: CIMB Classic
page_title: Best Quotes of the Week: CIMB Classic
slug: Best Quotes of the Week: CIMB Classic
body: Gary Player offers to help Tiger Woods get back on track, Michael Jordan disses golfer-in-chief Barack Obama and Fred Couples tells Ryder Cup alarmists to chill out in this week's edition of Quotes of the Week.
